nodes.text: The Fortitude-class assault shuttle was a shuttle utilized by the Galactic Republic during the Cold War and Galactic War with the Sith Empire. The Fortitude-class was largely identical to the Rendaran-class assault shuttle, its predecessor from the Great Galactic War, though the Fortitude-class was slightly smaller.

The Fortitude-class shuttle is identified as such in the Codex entry for the Lucky Lancer, a Rendaran-class assault shuttle featured in the Trooper class storyline on Corellia. The Lucky Lancer is identical to Fortitude-class shuttles, though it is slightly larger, but is still smaller than the 50-person NR2 gully jumper that appears in the Deceived.
